metadata.title: CVE-2018-8754 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** The libevt_record_values_read_event() function inlibevt_record_values.c in libevt before 2018-03-17 does not properly checkfor out-of-bounds values of user SID data size, strings size, or data size.NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libevt issue 5 onGitHub.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8754` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libevt-utils - 20170120-2
libevt1 - 20170120-2
python-libevt - 20170120-2
python3-libevt - 20170120-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libevt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20170120-2').
